content.detailedDescription:
Hello folks
"here i am again. "this photo i took at the beach here in vancouver bc canada. i had to take another look because i through this was way to detailed to be the real thing but i took the shot 
anyways and as you folks can see for yourselves that it is an "angel with bagpipes? it looks like bagpipes to me anyways." "flying away. "weird photo to say the less." well have a great 24 folks. be at peace.
content.summary: [submitter did not supply a short description/cms/tg]

content.detailedDescription: I was home with three other people that live in my apartment and since we have had various sightings from different people staying here we are always on the lookout and last night was the second time we spotted the same light at night doing the same thing. first it hovers around rather rapidly and erratically and then it remains stationary. it is pretty close to where we are at like about 200 feet or so maybe a bit more and we live in the 7th floor of a high rise so we have a pretty good view. it first hovers and moves side to side rapidly then remains stationary then after a couple of minutes it descends to where we think is a football field of a high school nearby and it descends very slowly and sometimes it moves left to right as like it were narrowing its landing site. i have yet to go and try and see where it lands and i might do that today. the movement from the videos i will send will show it is not a ship or a helicopter it is far too close and too small for that and i dont know what else it could be maybe somebody has a toy helicopter but its strange someone would fly that at night like that plus the speed of it is too fast and erratic to be made from any toy.
content.summary: Second time in a month that the same light does the same thing

content.detailedDescription:
Hello folks
"here is a simple "ufo" photo that i took in surrey bc canada. at first i was looking at something flying around. it flew right above me and then it just "hovered" over them folks on the bench. "right above the tree line." it was so close to them folks. i have no clue how they didn't know that it was right above their heads, just over that tree. there was no sound what so ever. so i took a photo of it but before i can take the photo it just shot upwards and then it just took off like a bat out of hell but i got him before he vanished into thin air." man that thing was fast. i have never see anything in my life go that fast but like i said i got him in a photo. so that's the story about this "ufo" photo. "have a great 24 folks
content.summary: Simple ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was a waiting customer in line at pep boys auto shop, just looking around.  a small, woman entered and she appeared oddly dressed; she looked to be in her 70s-early 80s, at first because of her rather messy gray hair, which fell about to the chin line.  she was about 4-5 ft. tall and wore very short, baggy unironed shorts and a baggy unironed blouse.  she had very thin legs and arms, greyish, pinkish skin.  she did not have the characteristics of progeria disease.  her face seemed normal.  my name was called and i turned by attention to business at hand and went to sit in the adjacent waiting room.  i had been seated there about 15 minutes, when this same woman came to the all glass door and tried to pull it open; she could not pull it open with one hand since her other hand was holding a small book and drink.  i started to get up (walk across the room) to help open the door, but someone sitting beside the door opened it for her.  she then sat down at a right degree angle to me (she at the 90 degrees and me sitting at 180 degrees), about 4 feet away from me.  i was curious about her since she seemed so strangely dressed.  i looked directly at her eyes, and her eyes met mine, and it was then that i noticed she had no white eyeballs; her eyes were completely black!  i was startled and i must have looked so, because she got up instantly and walked out of the waiting room.  i followed behind her about 20 seconds later, but saw her no more after looking around a bit.  (she may have been wearing a wig, she may have had a different kind of contact lense in her eyes, but something about her just seemed strange.  i have been wondering whether she was a hybrid. i also wonder whether anyone else has had an experience similar to this.  i reported this incident to my state director of investigations in mufon and he suggested i enter this report. i do so with hesitation because it sounds so bizarre, but i am a mufon field investigator. (some of my answers on this report really don't apply to this incident, so i answered because i could not submit this report unless i answered the questions - somehow.)
content.summary: This involved an unidentified entity

content.detailedDescription:
Hello folks
"this is a photo of a "gray alien" running past my older girl." there was no other children or anyone else around at the time of this photo being taking. just her and i. she was showing me her new classes." this gray look's like it also has something in its hand." as you can see. "this photo was taking in my home, in the afternoon. "my place was haunted. we don't live there anymore. "i live in vancouver now. so enjoy my "gray" and please have yourselves a great 24 one last thing. this "gray" looks like its running right into our little tree." now why was that? enjoy.
content.summary: Gray alien

content.detailedDescription:
Hello folks
"here is a "set" of photo's of my "pet" pterodactyl. he's been with me since i was 3 years old. "but lets get back to why i reported him. " he doesn't like to get his photo taking and every time that i try to take a photo of him he "vinishes" right in front of my eyes. "just look at the photo and you'll see what i mean. "the problem with this dude is he looks like some kind of a "machine". maybe he's an "alien craft" who knows for sure but like i said he's been following me around since i was 3 years old. "right after i had "heart surgery" he showed up. i am 51 year's old now so he's been with me now for over 46 to 47 years. "but like i said? he doesn't look like a living being he looks to much like some kind of "machine" that can vanish right in front of your eyes. well maybe you folks can tell me what he is...Because i have no clue. "he does look like a "pterodactyl" through..."well that's it that all about this dude. have a great 24
content.summary: Pet pterodactyl

content.detailedDescription: On october 31,2013 me and my girlfriend went out to okeechobee florida to find a festival for halloween night. we know the area by heart but all of a sudden we were in a strange town,real old with an ancient old brick mcdonalds. it was never there before, and it just appeared in front of us. we also hit a rainstorm and came across an old gas station we had never seen before before we hit this town. we left the town and a bad rainstorm with wicked lightning hit again out of nowhere, when we were leaving it. we knew we had to be heading still north on highway 441 to yeehaw junction and we never had taken a turn. when we thought we were approaching yeehaw caution light,we found out we were in lake placid heading to the west coast out of the blue,we did not understand. so we went back to okeechobee, and never saw that town. while at a red light while we were in that town,i was taking pictures all over from the passenger seat. even going out there,i was taking pictures. even the moon from the car on the way back. when we got back to indiantown, we started seeing out of the blue big orange barrels and the road went suddenly into a four lane highway. we were freaked out during all this and tremendously scared. a sign came up and said we were coming to u.S.1 in fort pierce florida. its like the car was just picked up and put there with us in it. when we got home we could not believe how late it was,we were missing three hours time. after i developed pictures,i caught a ufo beam coming through the car,an alien looking through the windshield, a looking king in the side view mirror and an orb in the clouds of the moon, and a circle over car going out there.
content.summary: Teleported by entities in okeechobee florida on halloween night

content.detailedDescription:
Hello folks
"i hope that your all well. here we go. "a friend and i went to a park in east vancouver called "strathcona park" to take photo's of that parks garden but before we got to the garden i seen what looked like an angel flying by. i had to take a second look because i believed that i was seeing thing "but when i looked up again at it, i then seen this (rounded) sphere in back of it so i took the shot (photo) and now here is that photo...Enjoy it. i made it into a "set" so you all can understand what i am saying. thanks

note? i have a lot of alien and spirit photos. i even have what i believe anyways evps with aliens talking to me. they said that my time is near. what that means is anybody guess. well once again. please enjoy my photos that i send to you. you folks are going to get a lot of photos from me. just remember? all the photos that i send to you are my photos that i took. thanks
content.summary: I was at

content.detailedDescription:
I was at church and walked out of the building and looked up and saw a light it was colored green. i watched it move down and partially change color to red and then white but was mostly red and green at the same time then all green. the object sat in one place for a while then started to move to my right across the sky. it stopped in place and then descended and moved laterally to the right at the same time then going out of sight. the object then was back up in the sky where it started i did not see how it got back up there it was just there. it moved slightly to the right again then back to the left and became stationary. as an air plane approached the object slowly lowered in the sky down behind some trees that were in front of me and i saw it no more. it was seen by some children and i stopped a friend who saw it as well. 

thank you!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green white and red light hovered and decended and ascended then moved laterally over a 30 min period then as a plane came near it decended and i did not see it again

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch smoking a cigarette when i noticed a handful of lights that seemed to be gliding towards me. i immediately stood up and began walking around the front of my house to get a better look and as i got to the street i froze in complete shock or awe because of what i was looking at. i don't quite know what i was feeling i haven't experienced something like that it was like i couldn't think. almost felt like my thoughts were stopped for a brief period of time as this object glided directly over me. maybe my brain was trying to put it all together. i mean the object was a giant triangular prism (not a pyramid) that looked as if it was bending space around its self while making almost no noise except a slight hum. as it glided over me i could see what may have been hyrogliphs on the surface reflecting in the moonlight. couldn't quite tell. i definitely could see some kind of force field around it there were some kind of waves traveling along the outside of the ship didn't look exactly like heat waves though to me it looked more like this ship was bending space around its self.  on the bottom there were multiple lights maybe around 7 with 3 pulsating lights lining the middle that were glowing from white to redish orange. i had a completely unobstructed view of the object as it kept its silent pace over me then shrunk over the horizon. when my brain kicked back into gear i felt like time was different somehow. i felt belittled. didn't really know what to do. i attempted to file a report that night and for the next one or two nights but each time i tried to access this website my phone would freeze. it was on october 17th 2014.
content.summary: Smoking a cig saw multiple lights coming my way with no sound and low to the ground

content.detailedDescription: Sometime in 2008 i was leaving the chuck e. cheese parking lot turning right onto vanowen in west hills california. a bright spherical metallic object was over roughly platt and vanowen. about two seconds after i visually locked it's presence it sped south in a flash because they can detect when they're being observed. thought, consciousness, life-force and gravity travel instantaneously throughout the universe. you can look up the thomas young experiment. i figure that was a pleiadian probe sent from one of their bases, the dulce mesa in new mexico, the lemurian base telos next to mt. shasta, the ethereal realm above shasta called shamballa/city of enoch or it came from rainbow city in the center of antarctica. as i turned onto the street a typical government owned black lincoln appeared behind me. i didn't like it tailing me, so i slowed down to force it to pass. i for some reason could hear the woman in the backseat say this to the driver "it's brewer. he doesn't want us behind him, go around." the lincoln went around me not to agitate me. why was it there? the pattern of sighting would state the object i saw was actually above my car for several minutes, but i have no memory of it and eyewitnesses called it in. if that woman was with national security then they installed a nanotube implant that allows me to hear their people or their collective hive mind they're connected to. i've been an abductee my whole life and it looks like some group tried to give me some kind of advantage or they simply use me in their agenda. the greada treaty was signed between the us government and the grays allowing them to abduct us citizens and it got completely out of control. it's not a coincidence that it anagrams to gray data tree. i've been raped by luciferians, assaulted by nephilim, threatened by reptilians and abducted by grays. i commonly deal with a disembodied race that engage in the morality and event string aspects of our species like it was an interactive holographic video game. i often have bleedback memories of tall white males in dark grey suits who look russian or germany and their skin is pasty as if they rarely see the sun and the mib's fit that description.
content.summary: 2 to 3 yards in diameter pleidian probe for from rindow city

content.detailedDescription: It was 11:30 pm i notice a bright light out my west window i watched them for maybe a couple of minutes i couldn't figure out what they were so i went and got my daughter they made no sound but ever time they got close to the street light they would glow really bright then when they moved away from light they were a dull color u could still see them but not as good as when they were under light i started recording them at the time i wasn't sure if my phone camera was catching them but it did i recorded them for a little over 14 minutes we finally went outside and got with in 10 feet of them one of them didn't care we were their it kept coming back to light and the other one never came back i told my daughter we needed to leave them alone i felt bad that we bothered them i have never seen orbs that moved that radical before
content.summary: There was two orbs

content.detailedDescription: At about 110am a coworker and myself left work from main st clarence ny to go towards lockport ny.We drove down salt rd a few mins and the sky lit up so bright and we saw a perfectly round orange object with almost like it was on fire but it was more like a haze around it.It stayed stationary for a few seconds and went north and disappeared. the whole event lasted no more than 10 seconds.What's really intriguing is that directly north of salt road maybe 15 -20 mins there is a nuclear power plant there..Aes somerset.
content.summary: A co worker and i left work at 1:10am and saw the object light up the sky and defend.

content.detailedDescription: Father was stationed  in jacksonville. my mother and i went to see a slide show at the neighbors,a neighbor knocked on door and we went outside. over the neighbor's house we saw a craft with glass windows and human looking people. three people had dark hair, very white skin, with black uniform, like spandex with fold over with silver trim. i only could see from the waist up as it appeared they were working at some kind of counter and only saw hands moving with light inside what looked like a globe over the saucer type. neighbors looked up and saw also, my mother claims she didnt see anything.Saucer then moved slowly behind trees and then we went back to our home.
content.summary: Saw craft with men like entity with black hair looking out window over trees near my neighbor house

content.detailedDescription: On the night i saw orbject i took my dog out for a walk my dog was sniffing along the ground i happed to look up and i saw the orbject i was in shock what i saw and now i think what the hell was that and where from
content.summary: The sphere shape i saw was gray in colour with green and red colouring it looked like it was made up of  square panels.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching a movie, about 10 pm the windows next to the tv screen showed an occasional blinking, then abruptly moving tiny star like object with red on the bottom and white on top.  the blinking went back and forth between colors.  the object seemed to be slightly vertically oval shaped.  as i watched more appeared.  i counted 5 at 11 pm.  one stayed in position, the others moved back and forth at varying heights over an area of a mile or so, and would hover for many seconds in one place at times.  it seemed random though.  it was hard to tell how far away they were.  i opened my window and listened but could hear nothing, too far away? i thought it was a star or planet but venus had moved to the north and out of sight by the time i was attracted to seeing them.
i was intrigued and felt as though i was being brave but didn't want to go drive to locate them.  at one point i said "come here it that's what you want" to myself, but nothing changed.

there is a hill near where i think i saw them with a road blocked by a chain and no sign.  this is in essex or hamilton, one off story street, essex and one off rte. 22 in hamilton.  this is not the first time i have seen a like thing, but i haven't for years.  i reported the last time to you too and the lights disappeared after that!

p.S. - no other dwelling is situated in a good viewing position from my side at least.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: From my 2nd story windows on a small hill i counted 5 at 11 behind tree branches, blinking and moving.  red on bottom, white on top.

content.detailedDescription: Was at home went into kitchen to do dishes after sunday lunch looked out of window and it was just there it was roof level, it was amber in colour no haze just solid structure no windows couldn't see trail nothing sky was clear apart from odd cloud about 30/40 miles away.I new it was ufo soon as saw it, when first noticed it it was hovering i turned my head and looked again it was still there then it started moving very slowly you had to keep looking to notice it moving. i walked into other room to call hubby to take a look, didn't want to scare children it took about 15 secs from me telling him and him looking there was nothing there beautiful blue sky but not a trace, i know what i saw and my heart was racing with fright when first spotted it.When i lived at a different address about 11/2 years later was closing window in lounge  can't remember what time of year it was but nice weather i looked over swansea bay where you can see the steel works and there was a golden brown bird i think eagle thought it was strange because it was night time maybe 9ish and it looked size of normal bird but miles away called hubby and we both went to front door to take a clearer look, we couldn't believe it it was coming in our direction made no noise and you could tell it was a flying machine for better words it had everything like bird beak, eyes plumage the lot when it went above us about 20 feet the eyes must be cameras as the one nearest us which would have been the left eye looked down on us didn't feel scared though. have looked all over internet to see if could find some spy plane or any plane that resembles it but nothing. from my first story i remember reading in a magazine months later that a lady in australia had spotted the same amber object as myself at tree level think it was 12 o'clock australian time.
content.summary: I describe it amber colour exactly like a door if turned on its side

content.detailedDescription:
Sphere with blue lights on the side
took picture of the halo around the sun and this came out in the pic.
content.summary: Took picture of the halo around the sun and this came out in the pic.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home with my girlfriend, when out of the corner of my eye i see a bright green orb hovering over my town's cell/communications towers.  after hovering for a short time (1-3 seconds), the green light flew off over the horizon, disappearing over the mountain at an incredible speed and acceleration.

i had no idea what i was looking at, it didn't seem like any aircraft i had seen before.  i thought perhaps it was a helicopter, but its rate of acceleration was incredible.  it was there, then, it wasn't and there was only a trace of light in its place.  it disappeared over the horizon of the mountain.

she also saw it, but not for as long as i.  afterward, we immediately thought "ufo", and it was definitely an unusual thing to see.
content.summary: Incredibly bright green orb hovered over cell towers then flew off at high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was reclining in my lawn chair at aprox 22:24, when directly overhead, traveling straight north, i saw 4-5 shapes, resembling large stars, amber in color, flying in formation, pass directly overhead.  these objects traveled in a "v" formation, were silent, seemed to be about 200 feet off the ground, and they appeared to be within 5 - 10 feet of each other.  my home is very close to an air force base, and also sits directly under the flight path of incoming and outgoing commercial aircraft going to and from salt lake int'l airport.  at the same time i saw this anomaly, there were commercial flights in the area.  judging by the speed of these commercial jets, it appeared that the items i saw were traveling at approximately the same speed as does a commercial jet, but much slower than an f-16.  it was a calm night, little to no cloud cover, a light breeze, and the stars in the sky were clearly visible.  the object(s) were travelling so quickly and at such a low altitude, that i lost sight of them within a very short time.  the objects never changed color, shape, speed or direction.  but since they were traveling in unison or formation, it certainly appeared to me that they were flying under intelligent control.
content.summary: 4-5 amber colored starlike shapes, traveling in formation, traveling from the south , heading in a straight line directly north

content.detailedDescription:
10pm on march 15, 2015 just as witness was leaving lake wales, florida.
the lit object came to an abrupt stop and hovered in the sky.  he added the inset blow-up of the object.  he said he couldn't get a clearer blowup “due to lack of pixilation” (sic).  
without the cupola, the object could be a streetlight except it was moving.
i learned of the sighting from a third party in little rock, ar.  he told her he doesn't know what the two right-side light sources are because he didn't notice them until i prompted her to ask. 
i have not spoken with the witness; as a potential publisher of his report, it’s better that he speak directly to mufon.  he's more than willing to discuss the sighting event. 
i also sent this same alert to the nuforc website.
since i am not the witness, there should be a place on this form to provide the witness contact information.  i have his telephone number.
content.summary: Illuminated disk with illuminated cupola moved, stopped, and photographed.

content.detailedDescription: When i was in the army we went to fort irwin the national training center. we were there in preperation for our deployment to iraq. i was in alpha company 3-4 an regt, 4th id based out of fort hood. on a late night flight one night around the 16th of october i was crewing my blackhawk uh-60 helicopter. i was a crew chief and had undergone the army's training for identifying foreign and domestic military aircraft and armorment. that night we were flying parallel to a small mountain range. i was looking out my window aided by my anvs-7 night vision goggles with a peq-2 infrared laser and spot light on my m240 machine gun. sorry a little side tracked. i was scanning my window for possible hazards to my aircraft when i noticed what looked like a really bright star. i thought it was cool. for some reason i stayed focused on the "star" for a about 30 seconds. something was different. i pointed my m240 at it and engaged my ir laser. guiding it onto my "star". as soon as my laser made contact with it the star shot off going straight north. this thing went from a stand still to mind boggling speed. it was out of sight within a few milliseconds. my pil ok t saw i t after it took off and told me to look at the shooting star. i have only told my wife and 2 close friends about this event. wasn't scary..Just really cool.
content.summary: Observed ufo while on flight training mission. stationary element rapidly accelerated when exposed to infrared laser.

content.detailedDescription: I was at pe at mickenly institute of technology in the feild and there were 2 black military jets were in the direction of the craft when they flew off i saw a large cone shaped craft with rounded edges.It looked kind of like a lampshade with a round top. it was hovering maybe 500 ft above the school building when i blinked and it had sped off about a mile away.It hovered and made precise turns at very high speeds then it shot off again and that is when i lost track of it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was at pe and i turned to the side seeing a large cone like object hovering over the school then i blinked and it was miles away.

content.detailedDescription: We were at a pavilion at a park,it was dark outside but street lights on inthe park,our friend was looking up at the sky, my friend thought they were droids,they were slowly moving,we were not afraid of the objects found them very interesting there was three of us who saw this event.
content.summary: Grey triangular solid

content.detailedDescription: We were at a pavilion at a park,it was dark outside but street lights on inthe park,our friend was looking up at the sky, my friend thought they were droids,they were slowly moving,we were not afraid of the objects found them very interesting there was three of us who saw this event.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello folks 
"i hope your all well. "now for why i am reporting this. the real reason is that i have a few photo's that i "took" from this park. "the park is called "crab park" its in the east end of vancouver." this is a set of photo's that i took. its in 6 photos. you'll see in the first photo a orb over the hat. then in the (2nd) photo you'll see a "huge" orb in the center of the photo. that huge orb has an another orb that is attached to it. that orb has a smaller orb attached to that. "its almost like them fire fighter planes that has a hose's on it so it can suck up the water" "it looks like that kind of deal."in the (3rd) photo you'll see that huge orb with the "gray" in it fly away (upwards)with its attachment orb with the smaller one. "you can tell its the same orbs over the water." in the (4th) photo you can see the "gray" inside that huge orb."he looks like he's praying or something like that. the (5th and 6th) photo are the same but bigger to show you the "gray alien" its as clear as day. 

"now back to why i am reporting this? its because i have not one "alien craft" but (two) from this same park. "but i guess i'll have to make a new report on that one after this one is done. i have (5) reports of aliens that i can report here, but you all will only get (2) of them. this park is full of "alien crafts" the next set that i will be reporting is about an "huge" orb coming out of the water, and then it followed me around the park intel i told it to f#&k off."then it just rolled up into its self. but not before it said,"that my time was near" now i see that thing every night that i go there. "so that's it. "please enjoy my "huge" alien space craft(orb) you can see the "gray" big time in it. 
"and as how i lost sight of it? it just flew away, upwards. "now i see them all the time. "well, thanks for hearing me out and enjoy the photos...."you know i am just going to post them (3) photo's of that "huge" orb following me around the park here also. so this will be two reports instead of one." now i am going to make another report of a "angel being followed by a (round) spear" in the day time...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: [no short description supplied by submitter/cms/tg]

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my apartment smoking at approximately 3:00am. i walked to the field behind my block to look at the stars, which i normally (always) do. i looked up and i saw what looked like a giant purple/vibrant pink - almost electric - octopus looking cloud in the sky. it wasn't in our atmosphere or anything (at least i think it wasn't). it looked like this was happening at a great distance because it was happening at a distance where you'd normally see starlight.
 
keep in mind, i do not have the proper scientific background to describe what i saw but i will do my best.  :p

now, this giant purple cloud/octopus looking thing was absorbing these little white lights that looked like stars. near the cloud, these lights would come out of nowhere and travel underneath and inside the cloud. this process kept on repeating itself for more than 45 minutes. i was watching in awe when my buddy from downstairs showed up on his bike. 

he asked, "what are you staring at?". i simply pointed up and said nothing. he muttered to himself,"holy $^ut!! what the heck is that thing?". we continued to watch the little stars come outta nowhere and get sucked up by this giant cloud. after a good 45 minutes, we had to walk away. it was late and we could not describe - nor comprehend what we just saw. i've seen several lights in the sky, what we would call your generic "lights-in-the-sky-doing-crazy-things'. i live in manitoba and you can get a fairly good view of the night sky, especially during the summer "cabin season". seems like the majority of stories i've heard pertain to lights in the sky, not giant cloud-like octopi swallowing newly generated stars out of no where.

if other people seen this thing before, it would be a relief. i was fortunate enough to have my buddy show up and see it for himself. the other time i seen lights in the sky, i was by myself. needless to say, with all these crazy happenings, i upgraded my cellphone (with camera and video!). i will catch something. i am positive that me and another friend saw the hypothesized "ashen light" from venus. it was brutally cold, almost -35 celsius when we saw that this past winter. but i digress. hopefully i will hear back from someone in the near future. 

chi-meegwetch (thank you) for your time,

[name removed/cms/tg] from winnipeg, mb
[email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Large octopus-type cloud absorbing lights (almost like stars)

content.detailedDescription:
Friday 1/21/11 6:20 pm cold and clear.

first seen 50 to 100 feet above ground just above tall trees on silverado trail as i was heading north, it crossed the road silently and very moving slowly ese, no sound, and moved very slowly, multiple weird orange/white lights. no visible form just lights in a triangle shape. the side facing me had a bank of orange lights with brighter lights on either end. the triangle shape was defined by this bank of lights and the single less bright light on the other side. it appeared to move sideways and not the direction of the triangle shape. i first viewed it on the west side of the road just above and before the trees, as i approached closer, it moved across the road directly above me and the 5 cars behind me. i strained to look though the windshield above me as i drove underneath it. no sound, no wind, nothing as it moved slowly across the road and me driving underneath (~50 mph). it was at least 100 feet wide. i still cannot believe what i witnessed with my own eyes. it was not! a balloon, plane or helicopter. i thought about pulling over to take a picture but had too many tailgaters behind me and no safe place to pull over safely until the hills and trees would block my view. napa, ca is close to travis air force base.
content.summary: Very large triangle shape with orange white lights moved directly above me while driving.

content.detailedDescription: Extremely bright pulsating red (long narrow) cone heading south, moving slowly, then fast, then slow, fast, slow, then stopping. it started dimming then shot off straight up at a tremendous speed. no sound, not a plane, blimp nor a helicopter. it may have been at 2000 feet and sure seemed very large, way larger than local military aircraft that are often seen. i've never seen or read about anything like it. it didn't have red lights, it seemed to be a big long triangle/cone shape that was very bright red. in the example image i created, the white lights were not observed, just offered as a comparison in size. one would be sirius and the longer white light is the apparent size of an aircraft.
content.summary: Long bright red cone

content.detailedDescription:
Large bright red light hovers and shoots off before dropping smaller red/orange lights, one drops then moves at a right angle.

tuesday jan 15, 2002 at 8:48 pm 45-48 degrees, dry, crisp and very clear dark night.

i am an amateur astronomer since 1973 and very familiar with not only the night sky but local air traffic and weather.

lights or objects sighted in hayward, ca, 15-25 degrees above the horizon looking east and my position is east of the hayward airport and west of the east bay foothills with lawrence livermore and sandia on the other side about 50 miles.

i had just got out of my car and removed an item from the trunk and as i turned looking up at the very clear starry night, looking east, with no traffic, and gemini just right of my view above trees and power lines. i then noticed a very large bright red stationary light and quickly discounted mars, a satellite, plane but not yet a helicopter. i assumed it was a helicopter at first by its apparent static movement but it slowly moved in circular pattern and then the light flickered and got dimmer/brighter. it appeared 10 times larger then any planet and many, many times brighter then sirius in the winter. as i watched i noted the background stars (2 faint ones) and i moved away from the neighbors porch light and positioned myself with a better view. i moved around to see it pass behind the power lines and to get a different angle of view. i noticed when i stopped moving that it was making a slow circular motion in a small area. i continued watching and heard nothing and it started moving in a linear manner to the south. i then alerted my neighbor. he came out and observed it. i asked that he turn his porch light off and he stated it would take forever to turn back on but he turned it off anyway. we both continued observing it and then i stated, "stay here while i grab my binoculars." i quickly retrieved them and came out and started viewing it in a wide angle and saw that it seemed to have no shape other then seeming very broad. i zoomed in and still no shape, i zoomed out again and focused to see it better and followed it as it moved. i noted no other lights or surface. it seemed to have a sphere shape but more like a very large bright red orb or sphere shape. i handed the binoculars to my neighbor and he looked for 10-20 seconds. i regained the binoculars and spotted it quickly and as i did it dropped a light from the bottom (not as bright, and much smaller and slightly orange/red) which moved very quickly at a right angle to the bright red light. i stated loudly "what was that?' and continued following it by eye and binoculars, it then dropped 4-5 more small bright reddish/orange lights that dropped quickly at a regular interval and they seemed to drop just over the hills or tree line. we both witnessed this. they seemed to be like flares shooting down with some sort of trail but they moved quickly, much faster than i would expect from a free fall. they were each slightly different in intensity/size and color. at this point the larger red light continued moving away and dimmed giving the impression of moving quickly away and out or dimming and moving away. i was watching with the naked eye at this point and could no longer locate the large red light nor the multiple smaller lights. i heard no sirens after and no other witnesses. my neighbor returned to his apartment and i sat at my computer recollecting any and all details.
content.summary: Large bright red light hovers and shoots off before dropping smaller red/orange lights, one drops then moves at a right angle.
